title: Sampling Methods for Uncertainty Quantification
text:
Description
This special topics course introduces modern computational sampling methods for uncertainty quantification in scientific computing and engineering applications. Topics include mathematical and computational principles of classical and contemporary sampling approaches with emphasis on deep generative models, variational inference, and simulation-based inference methods. Students implement sampling algorithms and apply them to uncertainty quantification problems through hands-on programming assignments.
